scripts.build:dev: pnpm --filter @farmerui/input run build:ESM-dev & pnpm --filter @farmerui/input run build:UMD-dev & pnpm --filter @farmerui/input run build:CMD-dev
scripts.build:dev-testdist: pnpm --filter @farmerui/input run build:ESM-dev-testdist & pnpm --filter @farmerui/input run build:UMD-dev-testdist & pnpm --filter @farmerui/input run build:CMD-dev-testdist
scripts.build:ESM-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TEST_DIST=false LIB_TYPE=module webpack -c webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:UMD-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TEST_DIST=false LIB_TYPE=umd webpack -c webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:CMD-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TEST_DIST=false LIB_TYPE=commonjs webpack -c webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:ESM-dev-testdist: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TEST_DIST=testdist LIB_TYPE=module webpack -c webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:UMD-dev-testdist: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TEST_DIST=testdist LIB_TYPE=umd webpack -c webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:CMD-dev-testdist: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TEST_DIST=testdist LIB_TYPE=commonjs webpack -c webpack.config.ts
